verses.text:
"And they shall be mine, saith the Lord of hosts, in that day when I make up my jewels." - Mal. 3:17.
When He cometh, when He cometh To make up his jew-els, All his precious ones up-on that loved and his own,
He will gath-er, He will gath-er The gems for his king-dom; All the pure ones, all the bright ones, His loved and his own.

chorus.text:
CHORUS:
Lit-tle ones to him belong, They are weak, but he is strong; They shall stand a-mong his jew-els, Bright gems for his crown.
